body.p:
Hd Qrts 11th Ky Cav
Lexington Ky Sept 21st 1864
Gov Thos E Bramlette
Governor

Permit me to recommend to your Excellency.// For the 1st Lieutenancy of Co. C. 11th Ky Cav Private Chas H. Edwards of same Regt. ^vice Saml P. Debaum resg Septr 21. 1864^He is a soldier in every sense of the word & well worthy of promotion

I am Gov your most obt servt
W. O. Boyle
Lt Col 11th Ky Cav

11 Cavy
Lexington Ky
Septr 21. 1864
Boyle W. O
Lieut Col.
Recommends Private Chas H. Edwards for the position of 1" Lieut Compy C. 11" Ky Cavy
Issue if vacancy
D W Lindsey
Com issd & forwd
Septr 21. 1864
Recd A. G. O. Septr 21. 1864
